content:
{"name": "Hillsborough County Aging Services- Home Delivered Meals", "alternate_name": "", "description": "We offer two meal programs:

*Weekday Lunch - Attendees can enjoy a hot noon meal in a group setting at one of our Nutrition centers located throughout Hillsborough County.
*Home Delivered Meals - Hillsborough County also provides nutritious meals to seniors who cannot leave their homes due to illness, disability or being too frail to attend a center.

There is a waiting list for the meal programs that identifies clients based on need. We do not charge any fees for the programs, but do accept donations.

To participate in the noon Weekday Lunch program or Home Delivered Meals, you must meet eligibility guidelines listed on our website: https://www.hillsboroughcounty.org/en/residents/social-services/seniors/senior-meal-services  Please call our Aging Services Customer Care Team at (813) 272-5250 to apply.", "email": "", "url": "hillsboroughcounty.org/en/residents/social-services/seniors/senior-meal-services", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "", "address_2": null, "city": "", "state_province": "", "postal_code": "", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 27.9483566, "longitude": -82.4548727}, "phones": [{"number": "(813) 272-5250", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "12:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "12:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "12:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "12:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "12:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Seniors Only"}]}
